an3.67:1.8: evaṃ hoti etarahi paccuppannamaddhānan’ti → evaṃ etarahi paccuppannanti (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr); evaṃ hoti etarahi paccuppannanti (sya-all, km)
an3.67:2.2: ṭhapanīyaṃ pañhaṃ na ṭhapeti → thapanīyaṃ pañhaṃ na thapeti (mr)
an3.67:3.2: aññātavāde → aññavāde (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed); aññātavāre (mr)
an3.67:8.4: tadariyo kathanācare → tadariyo na kathaṃ vade (mr)
